alert.note: Alert for Macon; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 03 at 5:02PM CST until January 03 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR CENTRAL MACON AND EAST CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 502 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waugh, or 10 miles southwest of Milstead, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tuskegee, Shorter, Franklin, Hardaway, Liverpool, Tuskegee National Forest, Davisville, Society Hill, Lake Tuskegee, Cross Keys, Cecil and Moton Field Municipal Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for south central, southeastern and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
